customer_addr:
740 N Railroad Ave
New Holland, PA 17557

citations.narrative:
During the inspection, the temperature of the guinea pig housing area exceeded 85°F. The kestrel temperature reading
ranged from 93 - 95°F in different areas of the facility. The guinea pigs appeared to be healthy, and the licensee was
utilizing fans and additional shading methods in attempts to reduce the temperature.
Guinea pigs can overheat quickly and become heat stressed when the temperature is too high.
The licensee must ensure that the ambient temperature for the guinea pig housing does not rise above 85°F for the health
and comfort of the animals.
Correct by: June 26, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.26(b) 
   
Facilities, indoor. 
During the inspection, the temperature of the guinea pig housing area exceeded 85°F. The kestrel temperature reading 
ranged from 93 - 95°F in different areas of the facility. The guinea pigs appeared to be healthy, and the licensee was 
utilizing fans and additional shading methods in attempts to reduce the temperature.  
Guinea pigs can overheat quickly and become heat stressed when the temperature is too high. 
The licensee must ensure that the ambient temperature for the guinea pig housing does not rise above 85°F for the health 
and comfort of the animals. 
Correct by: June 26, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
